summary: This module centralizes Prefect workflow state handling. It provides a StateGroup class that can collect multiple state objects, evaluate collective status (e.g., completed, final), and count occurrences of each state type. It also offers a suite of convenience constructors for the various predefined state categories and utilities for extracting results, exceptions, and converting exceptions into appropriate state representations.
business_intent: To give the Prefect orchestration engine and users a consistent, highâ€‘level interface for creating, inspecting, aggregating, and transforming execution states, enabling reliable status checks, result retrieval, and error handling across workflows.
